edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.dbselection
Class Index

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.dbselection.Index
public class Index
extends java.lang.Object

a wrapper class to hold a collection's server url, collection's name, description and it's index the index is in the form of a HashMap, with the term as key, and doc_freq as value

constructor, initialize this index with some parameters

n - the name of this collection

ind - the index of this collection
Method Detail

isSameCollection

public boolean isSameCollection(Index ind)
check whether two indecies are the same. They are considered the same only is they have the same server url and same name. (case-insenstive)
Parameters:
ind - the index to be compared with this index
Returns:
true on same collection false otherwise.

getDocFreq

public int getDocFreq(java.lang.String term)
get the document frequency of this term in this collection
Parameters:
term - the term whose document frequency is to be retrieved
Returns:
an integer, which is the document frequency for this term in this collection

getDocCount

public int getDocCount()
get the total number of documents in this collection
Returns:
the documents count for this collection
